title: Doukyuusei (OVA): Natsu no Owari ni (End of Summer)
synopsis: Using state of the art animation End Of Summer tells the story of one young man's relationship with five women in a frank and sensual manner seldom explored in even the most daring of live action films.
staff: [['Yoshimoto, Kinji', ['Director']], ['ELF Corporation', ['Original Creator']], ['Mori, Hisashi', ['Key Animation']], ['Takei, Masaki', ['Original Character Design']]]
